txt.en: Use the Call Radhril skill and talk to Radhril

'These half-orcs do not just guard the entrances to the mines. This is a mining operation as well. First, we should find and defeat the overseers of this mining operation. I am sure there will be one stationed at each Delf. We should also destroy what tools they have brought to excavate the mine. I am ready when you are.'
Use the summoning horn outside the East-delf to summon Radhril to your side.
You should talk to Radhril.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>

You should defeat half-orc overseers and destroy mining supplies and mining carts.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You have been tasked with defeating the half-orc forces gathered at the entrances to the mines of Writhenset.
'I commend your efforts, [placeholder]! Come, let us return and report our success to the Free Peoples.'
You should return to the small cabin near the East-delf.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
Return to the small cabin near the East-delf
